title: Does Rumble need a rework ?
body: i used to play rumble quite a bit, but I feel he is boring a lacks mechanics. He doesnt really feel like a yordle in a mech suit, but just a robot. I think he should be able to leave the mech or just have some fun mechanics which make him a bit more unique, cause at the moment the hardest thing is managing your spells for your passive and landing your large range ult. please post any ideas you peoples have to make rumble a more unique and fun champ xD

replies.body: I know that Rumble is pretty unpopular in lower ranks, and in some cases higher ranks, but that's just because of the new mastery system. He's find mate you just gotta innovate and be a meta - setter in this soon to be Season 6. {{champion:68}} FTW!
Theres no nice way of saying this, but it's just you, Rumble is fine.

i'm not saying rumble is bad, its just with the adc reworks and all the other reworks it feels as though riot is trying to make champions have fun mechanics, unique mechanics, and play like they look, i feel like rumble doesn't feel like a person in a mech, but just a mech, his abilities dont take much skill and you can't really master any mechanics with him, i feel a bit of an update could make him more popular and more fun, thank you for the respectful comment.
